template.description: Aggregazione oraria di dati di precipitazione provenienti da DPCN - creazione del gruppo che effettua l'aggregazione oraria dei dati di precipitazione provenienti da MeteoTrentino. Issue #512.
template.name: 1h-Aggregation of precipitation data from METN - 2025-06-30

labels.label: NB: il delete dei dai e dei logs relativi all'aggregazione dei dati di MeteoTrentino, vengono gestiti nel flusso di delete presente nel template principale di Meteo Trentino

entry.value: During the ingestion of 1h aggr pluvio METN data from file with id ${batchid.0} the following error happened: ${messaggio}.

processors.name: Log error (to be read by the monitoring system)

entry.value: E040 - Unable to save the errors in the db
Delays in ingesting 1h aggr pluvio METN data. The flow is currently ingesting the following data pack ${batchid.0} with the following datalast: ${dataora_last}

processors.name: Log error (to be read by the monitoring system)

entry.value: update public.metn_1h_aggr_logdata set ts_errore = to_timestamp(${now():toNumber()}/1000), ms_errore = '${messaggio:replace("'","''")}' where codice_stazione = '${codice_stazione}' and dataora_last = '${dataora_last}';

processors.name: Add service name and logfile name

entry.value: Ingest 1h aggr pluvio Mtn Data:Lacking activity as of time: ${now():format('yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss')}; flow has been inactive for ${inactivityDurationMillis:toNumber():divide(60000)} minutes
Ingest 1h aggr pluvio Mtn Data:Activity restored at time: ${now():format('yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss')} after being inactive for ${inactivityDurationMillis:toNumber():divide(60000)} minutes
E039 - Unable to convert from jsonline to bufr for sensor ${tipo_sensore}
E040 - Unable to save the errors in the db
During the ingestion of 1h aggr pluvio METN data from file with id ${batchid.0} the following error happened: ${messaggio}.

processors.name: Log error (to be read by the monitoring system)

entry.value: Meteotrentino 1h pluvio data Ingestion - the following error happened: ${messaggio}.

processors.name: Log error (to be read by the monitoring system)

entry.value: Delays in ingesting data. The flow is currently ingesting the following data pack ${batchid.0} with the following batchutc: ${batchutc}

processors.name: Log error (to be read by the monitoring system)

entry.value: Delays in ingesting 1h aggr pluvio METN data. The flow is currently ingesting the following data pack ${batchid.0} with the following datalast: ${dataora_last}

update public.metn_1h_aggr_logdata set ts_delete = to_timestamp(${now():toNumber()}/1000) where ts_delete is null and dataora_last < to_char((now() - interval '${MAX_DAYS_NIFI_DATA} days') at time zone 'UTC-1', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS');

processors.name: Log error (to be read by the monitoring system)

entry.value: update public.metn_1h_aggr_logdata set ts_errore = to_timestamp(${now():toNumber()}/1000), ms_errore = '${messaggio:replace("'","''")}' where codice_stazione = '${codice_stazione}' and dataora_last = '${dataora_last}';
E038 - Unable to convert from db record to jsonline for sensor ${tipo_sensore}
select codice_stazione, dataora_last, batchid, batchutc from public.metn_1h_aggr_logdata where ts_ingestion is null order by dataora_last desc limit 1;
delete from public.metn_1h_aggr_logdata where ts_delete is not null and dataora_last < to_char((now() - interval '${MAX_DAYS_NIFI_DATA} days') at time zone 'UTC-1', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS');
E035 - Errors in select the data to ingest
E034 - Unable to update the record in the db

with dati_filtrati as ( select dat.*, ldat.codice, ldat.batchutc, row_number() over ( partition by ldat.codice, dat.tipo, dat.dataora order by ldat.batchutc desc ) as rn from public.metn_dati dat left join public.metn_logdata ldat on ldat.batchid = dat.batchid where ldat.codice = '${codice_stazione}' and to_timestamp(substring(dat.dataora,1,10)||' '||substring(dat.dataora,12,19), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')::timestamp between to_timestamp(substring('${dataora_last}',1,10)||' '||substring('${dataora_last}',12,19), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')::timestamp - interval '59 minutes 59 seconds' and to_timestamp(substring('${dataora_last}',1,10)||' '||substring('${dataora_last}',12,19), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')::timestamp and dat.tipo = 'precipitazioni' ) select
ana.codice||' - '||ana.nomebreve as station_name, ana.quota as station_hmsl, null::varchar as ident, 'open-trentino' as network, (round(ana.longitudine::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lon, (round(ana.latitudine::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lat, to_char( to_timestamp(substring('${dataora_last}',1,10)||' '||substring('${dataora_last}',12,19), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')::timestamp - interval '1 hour', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"' ) as date,
1::integer as timerange, 0::integer as p1, 3600::integer as p2, 'B13011'::varchar as varcode,
sum(round(df.misura::numeric, 1)::double precision) as value,
1::integer as level1, null::integer as l1, null::integer as level2, null::integer as l2
from dati_filtrati df join public.metn_anagrafica ana on ana.codice = df.codice where df.rn = 1 group by station_name, station_hmsl, ident, network, lon, lat, date, timerange, p1, p2, varcode, level1, l1, level2, l2;
E036 - Unable to extract batchid and batchutc of the file to ingest
E037 - Unable to read the sensor data from db for the following sensore: ${tipo_sensore}

processors.name: Save the day and the hour (actual and of the file)
